DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy assess health lifestyle questionnaire , physical examination result prestudy laboratory test 2 . Females age 5068 year Day 01 study 3 . Postmenopausal confirm Follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) oestradiol ( E2 ) blood level ( FSH > 40IU/L , E2 < 70 pg/mL ) 6 . Normal Dutch eating habit 7 . Voluntary participation 8 .
